frontmatter.title: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp

node.html: Completed the Udemy bootcamp covering Python for data analysis and machine learning, including Pandas, NumPy, visualization, and building ML models. (Certificate: Oct 16, 2024)

Earned freeCodeCamp's Responsive Web Design certification covering HTML, CSS, flexbox, grid and responsive layouts. Built several projects demonstrating mobile-first responsive design and accessibility best practices.
Completed the Google Cloud skill badge on Cloud Skills Boost covering core Google Cloud concepts and hands-on labs. Gained practical experience with GCP tooling and cloud fundamentals.
